text: [Music]
my question I think to not just the
Muslim world but to the Western World in
fact to everybody uh you know on every
side of this so-called Clash of
civilizations that we're supposed to be
uh embroiled in uh right now would be
what is the civilization that you are
talking about what do you think of when
you say Western Civilization or Islamic
civilization and how is it that your
view of civilization is so drastically
different from the others view of
civilization that there that there is
this inevitable Clash that we're
supposed to be seeing this sort of
inherent division between these two
societies that uh for you know that that
um have no choice but to be on this
Collision Course with each other what is
it that you think your civilization is
that makes it so different from the
civilization of the other and I think
that in answering that question both
people in the Muslim world and the West
will come to realize how absurd the idea
of this division is uh yes we have
different ideas different ethnicities
different traditions and social Customs
but are we in a war between social
Customs are we in a war of
identities I hope not I think the idea
that
Civilization is something that is how we
Define ourselves as a people um which is
I think quite common amongst most people
I think that idea has to be debunked uh
there is something that that connects us
to each other that's far more visceral
and far more uh deep-seated than
civilization is and that is just the
Human
Condition
